8a72a08b-4d0a-42a7-824e-3fd12bae600b.description: Earners unlearn skills that no longer serve them and learn relevant techniques to become a VertexOne LEADER-COACH. Earners demonstrate the understanding that the first step to organizational change is the necessity of developing themselves before leading others. The Foundation module of the VERTEXONE LEADER as COACH Program is the first of four modules required to earn the LEADER as COACH badge.
8a72a08b-4d0a-42a7-824e-3fd12bae600b.name: VertexOne LEADER as COACH Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 7 hours of VertexOne LEADER as COACH instruction with a professional certified coach.
Complete 360-degree leadership effectiveness assessment.
Complete an emotional intelligence assessment with a minimum of three debrief sessions with a professional certified coach.
Attend 80% of all virtual class sessions and review recordings of any missed classes.

5e304b7a-0420-4227-a438-3667c67c223f.description: Earners lead through the development of others by promoting VertexOne's employee-first mindset and demonstrating the organization's working definition of coaching. VertexOne's coaching definition: Organizational lines and levels do not bind VertexOne Coaching; it is 'how' things get done by bringing out the best in every person, unlocking talent, discovering possibilities, and producing higher quality results.
5e304b7a-0420-4227-a438-3667c67c223f.name: VertexOne LEADER as COACH Influencer

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 16.5 hours of VertexOne LEADER as COACH instruction with a professional certified coach.
Earners complete pre and post self-assessments.
Complete 360-degree emotional intelligence assessment.
Apply program competencies to current organizational challenges through the capstone project.
Actively participate in and occasionally lead group work regarding content related to the program competencies.
Earners influence the culture by the intentional application and sharing of the program competencies and concepts on the job.

c3d889d8-7fb5-4289-bf56-11397947a6df.description: Earners unlearn skills that no longer serve them and learn relevant techniques to become a VertexOne LEADER-COACH. The Awareness module of the VERTEXONE LEADER as COACH Program is the second of four modules required to earn the LEADER as COACH badge. Earners understand how to create awareness in a meaningful manner, first of themselves and then with others. All parties must see the current and desired state for the coaching process to be successful. Creating awareness is critical for change.
c3d889d8-7fb5-4289-bf56-11397947a6df.name: VertexOne LEADER as COACH Awareness

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 7.5 hours of VertexOne LEADER as COACH instruction with a professional certified coach.
Complete an emotional intelligence assessment with a minimum of three debrief sessions with a professional certified coach.
Attend 80% of all virtual class sessions and review recordings of any missed classes.
Complete a 12-month personal effectiveness plan that incorporates learning from the program.
Successfully complete the Awareness knowledge validation assessment.

37897370-74d2-4225-97dc-45a1a15a1ac7.description: Earners continue to unlearn skills that no longer serve them and learn relevant techniques to become a VertexOne LEADER-COACH. The Cultivating Module is the third of four modules. Earners apply competencies from the first two modules to conquer facilitating results and accountability as it relates to the results of the coaching process.
37897370-74d2-4225-97dc-45a1a15a1ac7.name: VertexOne LEADER as COACH Cultivating

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 6.25 hours of VertexOne LEADER as COACH instruction with a professional certified coach.
Attend 80% of all virtual class sessions and review recordings of any missed classes.
Successfully complete the Cultivating knowledge validation assessment.

9cb19e27-7c86-44a8-ba49-e6dbd180b93a.description: Earners of this badge can now hold others accountable while simultaneously building solid relationships with those they lead. Earners also have an increased self-awareness to better course correct when they recognize when they are less effective. Additionally, earners can increase productivity by creating a safe work environment where employees feel free to ask more questions and take on new tasks.
9cb19e27-7c86-44a8-ba49-e6dbd180b93a.name: Effective Leader Coach - Level 1

alignments.name: SHRM PDCs
alignments.description: SHRM Accreditation Information HR Education Network is recognized by SHRM to offer SHRM-CP or SHRM-SCP professional development credits (PDCs). This program is valid for PDCs. See the course registration page for more information on the number of credits and credit types.

alignments.name: HRCI Accreditation
alignments.description: HRCI Accreditation Information HR Education Network is a recognized provider of recertification credits. HR Certification Institute® pre-approved this program for credits towards aPHRTM, PHR®, PHRca®, SPHR®, GPHR®, PHRiTM, and SPHRiTM recertification. See the course registration page for more information on the number of credits and credit types.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 10.5 hours of Effective Leader Coach instruction with a professional certified coach.
Pass five quizzes, a midpoint exam, and a comprehensive knowledge validation exam with a  70% minimum passing score.
Validate on the job application of competencies throughout the program.
Actively participate in group discussions regarding content related to the program competencies.

6881f41a-450a-4c50-a726-0d8ddaf4c33a.description: Earners lead through the development of others by promoting VertexOne's employee-first mindset and demonstrating the organization's working definition of coaching. VertexOne's coaching definition: Organizational lines and levels do not bind VertexOne Coaching; it is 'how' things get done by bringing out the best in every person, unlocking talent, discovering possibilities, and producing higher quality results.
6881f41a-450a-4c50-a726-0d8ddaf4c33a.name: VertexOne LEADER as COACH Participant

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 16.5 hours of VertexOne LEADER as COACH instruction with a professional certified coach.
Complete 360-degree emotional intelligence assessment.
Apply program competencies to current organizational challenges through the capstone project.
Participate in group work regarding content related to the program competencies.

e1d02d1c-f58d-4299-b57b-3762d72d0c69.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with relevant skills to reduce wasted time, prevent unnecessary rework, and shift employees to own their solutions and achieve better outcomes. Earners complete a formal change plan to address one organizational or team opportunity by applying the skills acquired in the program. Those who have earned the Level 2 Effective Focus LEADER COACH Certificate achieve more by developing themselves and those they lead.
e1d02d1c-f58d-4299-b57b-3762d72d0c69.name: Effective Leader Coach - Level 2

alignments.name: SHRM PDCs
alignments.description: SHRM Accreditation Information HR Education Network is recognized by SHRM to offer SHRM-CP or SHRM-SCP professional development credits (PDCs). This program is valid for PDCs. See the course registration page for more information on the number of credits and credit types.

alignments.name: HRCI Accreditation
alignments.description: HRCI Accreditation Information HR Education Network is a recognized provider of recertification credits. HR Certification Institute® pre-approved this program for credits towards aPHRTM, PHR®, PHRca®, SPHR®, GPHR®, PHRiTM, and SPHRiTM recertification. See the course registration page for more information on the number of credits and credit types.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners successfully completed The Effective LEADER COACH Level 1
Pass two quizzes, a midpoint exam, and a comprehensive knowledge validation exam with a 70% minimum passing score.
Validate the job application of competencies throughout the program by sharing with the class via the forum on a regular basis.
Actively participate in group discussions regarding content related to the program competencies.
Effective Leader Coach - Level 1
Earners actively participate in coaching workshops where they coach and receive coaching from their peer participants.
Earners complete 13.5 hours of live instruction including 4.5 hours of live coaching practice with peers.

2b4d8978-7a23-4cca-a628-8a7afdbb9fe9.description: Earners complete 25 hours of client coaching with a minimum of four unique clients as they fulfill the curriculum requirements of The Well-Equipped Coach Program. The 25 Hour badge represents the first milestone of becoming well-equipped.
2b4d8978-7a23-4cca-a628-8a7afdbb9fe9.name: 25Hours TWEC Coaching Experience

badge_template_activities.title: Formally contract with a minimum of four unique clients and complete 25 hours of client coaching.
Attend The Well-Equipped Coach program led by an International Coaching Federation (ICF) Professional Certified Coach (PCC).
Complete a minimum of one individual mentoring session with a PCC level ICF mentor.
Receive a satisfactory rating of an observed client coaching session with written competency-based feedback documentation.
Complete all requirements of The Well-Equipped Coach curriculum to date and attend 80% of all live classes.

cf579d4d-b52e-431a-bcf5-a89eba4b7b2d.description: Earners complete 50 hours of client coaching with a minimum of six unique clients, in addition to two group and three individual mentoring hours with a PCC-level ICF mentor. The 50-Hour badge represents the second milestone of becoming well-equipped as they fulfill the curriculum requirements of The Well-Equipped Coach Program.
cf579d4d-b52e-431a-bcf5-a89eba4b7b2d.name: 50Hours TWEC Coaching Experience

badge_template_activities.title: 25Hours TWEC Coaching Experience
Formally contract with a minimum of six unique clients and complete 50 hours of client coaching.
Attend The Well-Equipped Coach program led by an International Coaching Federation (ICF) Professional Certified Coach (PCC).
Complete a minimum of two group and three individual mentoring hours with a PCC-level ICF mentor.
Receive a satisfactory rating of an observed client coaching sessions with written competency-based feedback documentation.
Complete all requirements of The Well-Equipped Coach curriculum to date and attend 80% of all live classes.

922f6c58-1b29-4a96-a170-72282cb8d31c.description: Earners of this badge re-shape their organization's leadership culture to reflect a culture that demonstrates leadership through the development of others. Earners of this badge use a proven methodology to share program concepts that focus on how things get done by bringing out the best in every person, unlocking talent, discovering possibilities, and producing higher-quality results. Earners may facilitate the program for the period reflected in the Effective Focus, Inc. licensing agreement.
922f6c58-1b29-4a96-a170-72282cb8d31c.name: VertexOne LEADER as COACH CHAMPION FACILITATOR

badge_template_activities.title: VertexOne LEADER as COACH Influencer
Co-facilitate 16.5 hours of VertexOne LEADER as COACH instruction with a professional certified coach.

Earners meet with each capstone project team to provide coaching as needed in the development of the capstone presentation. Earner also attends each final capstone presentation for the purpose of sharing best practices across the organization.
Earner teaches back program concepts and competencies to the program consultant to validate understanding.
Earner completes a year-long mentoring engagement with a certified International Coaching Federation (ICF) professional coach.

1b167387-c87d-4efc-9e58-a7a12d2f1a34.description: Earners of this badge can now hold others accountable while simultaneously building solid relationships with those they lead. Earners also have an increased self-awareness to better course correct when they recognize when they are less effective. Additionally, earners can increase productivity by creating a safe work environment where employees feel free to ask more questions and take on new tasks.
1b167387-c87d-4efc-9e58-a7a12d2f1a34.name: Effective Leader Coach - Level 1

alignments.name: NASBA - CPE
alignments.description: Business Professionals' Network, Inc. is registered with the National Association of State Boards of Accountancy (NASBA) as a sponsor of continuing professional education on the National Registry of CPE Sponsors. State boards of accountancy have final authority on the acceptance of individual courses for CPE credit.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 10.5 hours of Effective Leader Coach instruction with a professional certified coach.
Pass five quizzes, a midpoint exam, and a comprehensive knowledge validation exam with a  70% minimum passing score.
Validate on the job application of competencies throughout the program.
Actively participate in group discussions regarding content related to the program competencies.

c437b935-7f0f-426e-85a4-c2f825f71f7c.description: Chief Executive Officer badge earners ignite a leadership culture of ownership and accountability by sponsoring a three-year commitment to developing leaders through an organizational-wide implementation of the LEADER as COACH program. Earners strengthen the alignment between leadership development and the organization’s results through co-creating the organization’s working definition of coaching. Earners identify leadership skills as a direct link to employee engagement.
c437b935-7f0f-426e-85a4-c2f825f71f7c.name: VertexOne LEADER as COACH CEO Sponsor

badge_template_activities.title: VertexOne LEADER as COACH Influencer
Earners meet with each capstone project team to review how the program competencies are applied to current organizational challenges.
Earners engage with an International Coaching Federation (ICF) professional coach throughout the duration of the program.

95b7c185-6438-4596-ad44-bef31d8e4920.description: The Impact Module is the final module. In small groups, earners commit to addressing a current business issue by applying competencies from the program and formally presenting their change management plan to key executives in the organization.
95b7c185-6438-4596-ad44-bef31d8e4920.name: VertexOne LEADER as COACH Impact

badge_template_activities.title: Earners work in small cross-functional teams to create a change management plan that they personally execute to address a current organizational issue or initiative. Earners present their plans to key executives in the organization in a formal setting that allows for interactions with the C-suite executives.
Attend all capstone prep sessions and contribute to the final presentation.
Complete personal change management plan.
Complete the post-program Leadership Effectiveness 360 assessment.
Complete peer review for each member of the capstone team.

7ed08be7-9b2a-48e1-9290-0787696b4604.description: By completing a Return on Investment study, earners link their personal changes in behavior and leadership style to organizational financial impacts. Through formal reporting and data validation, badge earners reinforce the connection between leadership skills, employee engagement, and organization results.
7ed08be7-9b2a-48e1-9290-0787696b4604.name: VertexOne LEADER as COACH ROI

badge_template_activities.title: VertexOne LEADER as COACH Influencer

Earners participate in the Return On Investment study and calculate the financial impact of behavior and leadership style changes. Final financial impact amounts validated by Chief Financial and Chief Human Resources Officers.
